teams.description: This team is setup on behalf of Luca, our 2 year old son.

teams.loan_because: We support small business owners in the United States.

If you are interested in loaning to small business owners in the U.S. or if you want to help bring Kiva to your city, this team is a community to expand the reach of Kiva in America.

teams.description:

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: First Lutheran Community Church
teams.loan_because: We loan because each of us can make a difference in the world! Micah 6:8 says "Do justice, love kindness, walk humbly with your God". The word justice in the Hebrew language of the O.T. is “mispat”. It means God’s wisdom, God’s law, God’s distributive judgment…that within the human family there would be fair play, everyone would get a piece of the pie, an equal share of the blessings of being here. An equal shot.

teams.name: TaP Micro-Financing Group
teams.loan_because: We believe that giving people the opportunity to make income is the most sustainable way to bring the masses out of poverty.
teams.description: We are a team of people who want a sustainable solution to end mass poverty and world hunger.  We believe that ending world hunger is not some naive concept for unrealistic dreamers anymore, but rather a goal that can be achieved with the correct global strategy.

teams.description: "A religious man is a person who holds God and man in one thought at one time, at all times, who suffers harm done to others, whose greatest passion is compassion, whose greatest strength is love and defiance of despair."   -Abraham Joshua Heschel

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: ONE@USC
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description:
As Trojans, we have the power to help in the fight against extreme poverty and AIDS. We stand to support fair trade reform and debt cancellation in order to help the world’s poorest countries climb out of extreme poverty and fight deadly disease like AIDS and malaria.

Today, less than 1% of the U.S. federal budget is focused on meeting these goals. It is our responsibility to lend our voices to affect the social and political agenda. We stand together, not as Republicans nor Democrats, but as ONE Trojan helping our fellow brothers and sisters around the world find proper health care and education.

Together, Trojans can become unified as a CampusONE! Fight On!

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Atherton Tablelands
teams.loan_because: We enjoy helping others.
teams.description: Kiva Lenders who live on, have lived on, or have a strong connection to the beautiful Atherton Tablelands region of Australia.  We invite you to join our team at Kiva.

teams.name: GlobalGiving
teams.description: A team for Kiva users who also enjoy donating to grassroots charity projects at GlobalGiving - http://www.globalgiving.com

teams.name: Respect For Wildlife
teams.loan_because: We are alarmed at the way in which our native animals are currently being exploited, hurt or killed by humans.  We are alarmed at the rate at which the planet's wild animals are being endangered due to poaching for greed, illegal trafficking and destruction of habitat.  We are concerned for the welfare of individual animals, which have a right to live in the natural environment in peace, as well as the healthy survival of species and their eco-systems.
teams.description: Hi.  My name is Liz.  I am extremely concerned about the plight of the elephant, both Asian and African, due to poaching for ivory, and mistreatment.  I am also very concerned about the survival and welfare of the orangutan in Asia, and the consumption of palm oil which leads to habitat loss.  Please join me in standing up for the world's wild animals and eco-systems.  No matter which animals your are concerned about, this is a team for you!

teams.name: Belmont University Class of 2015
teams.loan_because: Belmont University is a student-centered Christian community providing an academically challenging education that empowers men and women of diverse backgrounds to engage and transform the world with disciplined intelligence, compassion, courage and faith.
teams.description: Belmont University's Class of 2015.

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Team Archer
teams.whereabouts: Salt Lake City, UT and beyond!
teams.description: We are the family and loved ones of Warren and Bonnie Jo Archer, who are such wonderful examples of giving and service

teams.name: GNU/Linux and Free Software
teams.loan_because: Microcredit and free software - both revolutionizing ideas, and great tools to bring power and opportunities to those who need it the most.
teams.description: We are here because we want to give people opportunities - and spread the word about free software that belongs to everybody.

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Seattle
teams.description: The Seattle Kiva Lending Team is for people who love Kiva as much as they do Seattle.

teams.name: US Military Servicemen and Veterans
teams.loan_because: We know that the the power of American servicemen is not only in their military prowess...but in the generosity and freedom that we personify.
teams.description: The generous warriors of today and the wise veterans of yesterday. Promoting American freedom, ideals and security through the advancement of economic growth and prosperity.

teams.name: Kiva Capitalists
teams.loan_because: Capital and business make the world go round; trade is a stabilizing force. Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods and services they need or want is what capitalism is all about. We are all proud capitalists, and some of us are even unrepentant.
teams.description: Free markets, free minds. Hayek, Mises, Friedman.

teams.name: Kiva Philadelphia
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of empower.
teams.description: Kiva Philly was born in 2007, and has grown considerably over the years.

teams.name: Friends of Mitra Usaha Kecil
teams.loan_because:
We care deeply about Mitra Usaha Kecil's (Micro Enterprise Partners) mission to support microentrepreneurs, empower the poor, and preserve the environment.

We encourage you to loan through Kiva's Field Partner Mitra Usaha Kecil.
teams.description: We are lenders who support the borrowers of microfinance institution Koperasi Mitra Usaha Kecil (Micro Enterprise Partners) located in Bali, Indonesia.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm

http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.description: Alaskans going global and changing the world $25 at a time!

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.description: As members of the TripAdvisor travel community, this team is excited to make a difference worldwide with support from TripAdvisor.

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.
teams.description: Portuguese Lenders Team

teams.name: Buffalo, New York Lending Group
teams.loan_because: We truly care about the people we help.
teams.description: We would like to represent to the world the generosity and caring that is so prevalent in Buffalo and Western New York.

teams.name: EY
teams.loan_because: Kiva is well-aligned with what we see as EY's broader corporate responsibility, which is to put our people’s workplace skills toward making a difference in our communities around the world.  We recognize the power of entrepreneurship for job creation and poverty alleviation.
teams.description: EY is one of the largest professional services firms in the world.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Wisconsin
teams.loan_because: Wisconsin's progressive ideals thrive here!
teams.description: We are doing what we can to help make the world a better place through giving a hand to those with a plan.

teams.name: Team California
teams.loan_because: Our state rules and we care about the world around us!
teams.description: We are from the great state of California!

teams.name: Milwaukee Brewers
teams.loan_because: We want to harness the pride, passion and commitment of Brewers' fans, players and other supporters to positively impact the lives of entrepreneurs around the world.
teams.description: The Milwaukee Brewers are a Major League Baseball club located in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. They play their home games at Miller Park.

teams.name: Dog Lovers UNITE!
teams.loan_because: We want to and will make the lives of people better.
teams.description: This is for anyone (don't be deceived by the name) we would love anyone to join, so please do!

teams.name: Newcastle United
teams.description: Newcastle United is a professional football club in Newcastle, England. They play their home games in St. James' Park (and always will).

teams.name: MLS soccer fans
teams.description: Fans of Major League Soccer, the professional football / soccer league representing the sport's highest level in both the United States and Canada.

teams.name: Worthington Kilbourne
teams.loan_because: We care and we can.
teams.description: We are a group of people from the Worthington Ohio area who support Worthington schools and their interests.

teams.name: Purdue University
teams.whereabouts: West Lafayette, Indiana, Earth, and Beyond!
teams.loan_because: As a land-grant university with a strong commitment to sustainable development around the world, we whole-heartily support efforts to help alleviate global poverty.
teams.description: The Purdue University Kiva Lending Team welcomes all students, faculty, staff, alumni and friends of Purdue University.

teams.name: Buddhists for World Peace
teams.loan_because: Peace is our focus and helping others to create success and happiness for their self and community leads to peace and is the boddhisatva way.
teams.description: Many in body, one in mind.

teams.name: Kiva Buddhists
teams.loan_because: We water seeds of awakening.
teams.description: We are Buddhists of all variety, but focus here is on the way of the Boddhisatva.

teams.name: YOUNG ENTERPRENUERS
teams.loan_because: we need to fight poverty starting with the young poor people
teams.description: fighting poverty

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Capgemini University
teams.loan_because: Kiva gifts were offered to consultants contributing to Capgemini Consulting University
teams.description: consultants, willing to help others

teams.name: Nana's Dream Team
teams.loan_because: it is not what we take but what we give that determines our true worth.
teams.description: Combination of some of the most careing, wonderful people I know. Both family and friends.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Building Learning Communities
teams.loan_because: We can make a difference and bring "meaning" to the classroom.
teams.description:
In 2008, Alan invited Jessica Flannery, the co-founder of Kiva, to present at BLC. Jessica told a very touching story of why she wanted to help the working poor. Since that time, the Building Learning Communities’ team has loaned $10.385.00 to struggling entrepreneurs around the world. We would like to invite you to help grow our team and have even more impact.

Kiva is a non-profit website that allows you to lend as little as $25 to a specific low-income entrepreneurs around the world. You choose who to lend to - whether a baker in Afghanistan, a goat herder in Uganda, a farmer in Peru, a restaurateur in Cambodia or a tailor in Iraq - and as they repay the loan, you get your money back. 

By joining our lending team, we can work together to alleviate poverty.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

KivaTools:
http://kivatools.com/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kiva Spanish Translators
teams.loan_because: We want to support Kiva entrepreneurs in every way we can.
teams.description: We are Kiva volunteer translators and friends who are inspired to support Kiva entrepreneurs with our translation skills and with loans.

teams.name: Late Loaning Lenders
teams.loan_because:
We hate to see loans being left unfunded on 
Kiva. Although most of these loans are 
pre-funded by the Field Partners, the Field
Partners lose out on the capital if a loan
doesn't get funded on Kiva. We believe that 
this will damage the Field Partners in the long 
term and impair their capacity to make loans to new borrowers.

We can't save every red loan, but we try to
make a difference as in the Starfish Story:
http://67.199.70.191/articles/the-starfish-story.aspx
Help us fund loans we're already supporting:
http://www.kiva.org/team/late_loaning_lenders/loans?status=fundRaising


Check out Charlotte's Web: http://starfish.dynalias.org

This watchlist for loans suggested by the team members (starfish + offlist) shows:
* the current position in the popularity ranking (considering pages 1 to 5)
* the timestamp of the most recent loan
* the basket amount
Click magnifier icon for more info.  Or read Charlotte’s post at @Charlotte re: #346848
Also known as "CW," or "Charlotte's Web of Wonders"


We invite you to join us and make a difference, too. Please check the team board at 2 am Kiva time, 7 am Kiva time, 1 pm Kiva time and 6 pm Kiva time to coordinate lending.

See our team fund page:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/kivalllfund
teams.description:
Alan's account of the founding of LLL is on the  team board @Alan re: #260143. Loans that are nearing expiry won't get funded if they don't get noticed. We look for loans that are about to expire by using the Sort By:
"Expiring Soon" option instead of the default "Popularity", and then work to get them funded.

See our team FAQ, linked above (the "Team Website" button, next to our traffic light avatar).

A Team LLL glossary (contributed by team member Tony):

Red Loans: Loans that have less than five days to be funded, identifiable by the red box with the notice that says "Only x days left!" or 
"Only x hours and y minutes left!"

LLL - Late Loaning Lenders: this team, where 
lenders work together to keep loans from 
expiring.

SFDD - Starfish Daily Dozen: Under current 
practice, one of these lists is prepared and 
posted for each day, to help LLL lenders focus 
and coordinate their lending on a targeted 
group of loans (the Starfish or SF). The lists 
are prepared by a group of volunteers who 
seek to be objective in selecting the loans to 
be included in their lists. They also seek to 
spread out the loans in each list over a 24 hour 
period and to share the joy among the Field 
Partners with loans expiring during that period, 
but their efforts are always constrained by the 
choice of loans that are available for inclusion 
in the list. Loans with larger amounts needed 
will be included in the period immediately after 
each Credit Day, when lenders are feeling 
flush, but the lists will become less ambitious 
when the LLL lenders are feeling poor.

GG - Gorgeous Group: The SFDD list-makers usually add one or two of these loans at the end of the SF daily dozen lists. As the name 
implies, only group loans are picked. When it is 
first posted, a typical GG loan will expire two 
days or more after the list is posted. It will 
usually be retained as a GG until it becomes 
Fully Funded or moves into Starfish range. The amount needed when the loan is selected as a GG will vary depending on the time of month.

OPM - Abbreviation for "other people's money."  Our main lending method is to coordinate LLL team members' loans, so that we make several loans to a borrower within a short period of time. This will move the borrower's loan request up in Kiva's "popularity" sort and get the loan noticed by other people (non-members of the LLL team).  Many loans then get their funding completed by loans from those non-LLL members.  By attracting other lenders' attention to our Starfish loans in this way, we multiply the impact of our finite funds, and save more loans from expiring than we otherwise could.

RTR - Reduce the Red: These lists are 
prepared and posted when there are large 
numbers of loans slated to expire in a short 
period of time. "Red" is a reference to the red 
boxes that are added to a loan description 
when the Loan is about to expire without full 
funding.

Bulge: A short period in which a great many loans have their scheduled funding expiration times. This may happen when, for example, the volunteer coordinators at Kiva offer a promo of some kind to the editors & translators, to get them to do a lot of work in a very short period of time. Bulge loans are prime candidates for inclusion in Reduce the Red lists.

BTB - Battling the Boxes: On those days where 
there aren't 12 loans that qualify as "Starfish," the listmakers will include loans that have their red boxes, but more than 24 hours left before their deadline, to make up the 12 loans for the list. The criteria are similar to SF 
loans, i.e., one per field partner and reasonable 
amounts left to fund (not too much; not too 
little), except that these loans may have a longer time left before their expiry date. If they gain good traction on their first BTB day, they may be carried forward. If not ... they stand a second chance as SF.

FF - Fully Funded: This is LLL code for a loan 
that has received all the loans required for it to be removed from the list of loans that are raising funds 
and to move into paying back status.

Lars Ratio: the average funding per hour that is needed for a loan to become fully funded.
(Developed by team member Lars)

Wiedergänger (contributed by Maria) - German expression, literal translation "again walker," meaning "undead," i.e. a person that has died but comes back, aka a zombie. Here it means a loan that disappears from the page, but comes back again because somebody didn't check out their basket.

Ruma sana (contributed by Jouko and Potkukelkka) - Finnish expression, literal translation "ugly words."  It is a phrase to use when you are very frustrated, but want to stop just short of actual cursing -- for example, when the Kiva site repeatedly logs you out when you are trying to rescue an expiring loan at the last second.

See data about all loans currently fundraising on Kiva:
www.kivatools.com
See data about loans that have been mentioned on the LLL board, including the most recent lending activity on each loan:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/
See loans in real time, as they are made:
http://www.http://kivalive.com/index2.php
See "the fireworks" when lending is very fast:
http://www.kiva.org/live

Lists are posted on the LLL Team message 
board. Join us!

teams.name: Beer Goggles Never Lie... much
teams.whereabouts: with a coldie in one hand and a hottie in the other... maybe
teams.loan_because:
We love a beer, and we love to loan. Coincidence? I think not!
By the way, I lurv what you've done with your hair...
teams.description:
Saving the world, one beer (and loan) at a time. Errrrrrrrr, it's your shout, round, whatevaaaaaa... mine's a lager thanks.



Beer is your friend... SO GET IT INTA YAAAAAAAAAA!!!


Beauty is in the eye of the BEER HOLDER...

teams.name: Team USC
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.
teams.description: We are a group of students from the University of Southern California who care about making a difference.

teams.name: Maastricht University
teams.description: Maastricht University (UM), the most international university in the Netherlands, stands out for its innovative approach to learning and international outlook. With 14,500 students and 3,500 staff, UM offers a wide choice of academic programmes, all of which are designed to bring out the best in its students.

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Gay Christians making a differance
teams.loan_because: John 21:17
teams.description: We believe that Christ saved us so that we would be free to love ourselves and others.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.name: Knights of Columbus
teams.loan_because: Many threads make up a rope.  We are Catholic Brothers bound together by Charity, Unity, Fraternalism and Patriotism.
teams.description:
Learn About Us 
Visit Our 125th Anniversary Web Site

Thanks to the efforts of Father Michael J. McGivney, assistant pastor of St. Mary’s Church in New Haven and some of his parishioners, the Connecticut state legislature on March 29, 1882, officially chartered the Knights of Columbus as a fraternal benefit society. The Order is still true to its founding principles of charity, unity and fraternity.

The Knights was formed to render financial aid to members and their families. Mutual aid and assistance are offered to sick, disabled and needy members and their families. Social and intellectual fellowship is promoted among members and their families through educational, charitable, religious, social welfare, war relief and public relief works.

The history of the Order shows how the foresight of Father Michael J. McGivney, whose cause for sainthood is being investigated by the Vatican, brought about what has become the world's foremost Catholic fraternal benefit society. The Order has helped families obtain economic security and stability through its life insurance, annuity and long-term care programs, and has contributed time and energy worldwide to service in communities.

The Knights of Columbus has grown from several members in one council to more than 13,000 councils and 1.7 million members throughout the United States, Canada, the Philippines, Mexico, Poland, the Dominican Republic, Puerto Rico, Panama, the Bahamas, the Virgin Islands, Cuba, Guatemala, Guam and Saipan.

teams.name: { Kiva Fellows & Alumni }
teams.loan_because: We have been to the field and have seen Kiva work firsthand.
teams.description: Kiva Fellows are volunteers who work for Kiva and the field partners and serve as the glue that makes Kiva's model work.

teams.name: Vision Finance Company Supporters
teams.loan_because: We support the mission of Vision Finance Company (VFC), a partner of World Vision International.  VFC targets the productive poor, typically women, in rural areas to create holistic change for entire families.
teams.description: Vision Finance Company was Kiva's first partner in Rwanda.  Members of this team support VFC and Rwandese microentrepreneurs.  We believe in the positive change that microfinance has brought about and will bring about in this country.  We support VFC's clients and Rwanda's economic development at a grassroots level.  This country is on the rise and we support the positive change that we see.

teams.name: TLM West Timor
teams.loan_because: We loan to empower poor entrepreneurs within NTT via  the economic, social, and spiritual transformation of their lives.
teams.description:
TLM is microfinance cooperative that seeks to improve the quality of life for poor communities in the province of NTT, Indonesia.  At the end of December 2010 TLM had approximately 21,463 clients and averaged 118% operational sustainability throughout 2010.

TLM is currently a Pilot MFI with Kiva and is working through their transition from Pilot to Active.

teams.name: Women and Associations for Gain both Economic and Social (WAGES)
teams.loan_because: We support gender equity and poverty alleviation through the power of microfinance.
teams.description: We support WAGES urban entrepreneurs throughout  Togo's capital city.

teams.name: Intuit
teams.loan_because: Intuit is honored to dedicate the efforts of our Kiva lending team to the memory of our friend and colleague Anne Henderson. Anne passed away in September 2010 after a long battle with cancer. She was a bright light to everyone around her and was passionate about helping entrepreneurs through Kiva. We are inspired by her compassion, and are honored to continue her efforts to alleviate poverty. Anne, you will be greatly missed.
teams.description: At Intuit, corporate social responsibility is more than just a business practice, it's a longstanding part of who we are. It's our culture. It's one of our core values: We Care & Give Back. Anyone may join and invite others to join the Intuit lending team.

teams.name: Half the Sky
teams.loan_because: "Women and girls aren’t the problem; they’re the solution."
teams.description: Empowering women with microloans sparks generations of economic change.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Jonny and Ali's Kiva Love Machine
teams.loan_because: We met while we were both working at Kiva, and now we're getting married on October 23, 2010. What better way to celebrate than by making loans to Kiva entrepreneurs?
teams.description: We would love for you to join in and lend with us!

teams.name: Kivans Against Cockfighting Loans
teams.loan_because: KACL believes in the power of microloans and the potential of Kiva, but we believe Kiva should not list loans related to Cockfighting (or Dog Fighting, Bull Fighting, or any other blood sports).
teams.description: We want to help people escape poverty, and avoid the promotion and celebration of extreme cruelty.

teams.name: ∞ Braincrave ∞
teams.loan_because: We believe the children are our future.  Teach them well and let them lead the way.  Show them all the beauty we possess inside.  You've got to give them a sense of pride.  To make it easier - let the children's laughter remind us how we used to be.
teams.description: We are the alpha and omega of all things Kiva.

teams.name: Hey Girl
teams.loan_because: Hey girl, I respect you when you lend
teams.description: Hey girl, have I ever told you how good you look when you alleviate poverty?

teams.name: VIDB Dutch Division
teams.loan_because: We can make a difference!
teams.description: Sportsteam with strong social commitment, trying to contribute to society. At least most of the members...........

teams.name: Startup Riot
teams.loan_because: We want to help entrepreneurs everywhere.
teams.description: We are individuals involved in startups - either as entrepreneurs, investors, or supportive individuals.  We riot for startups and entrepreneurs!

teams.name: Team Kansas City
teams.loan_because: We love the idea of empowering other people to help themselves.
teams.description: We are proud residents of a wonderful town.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Soroptimist
teams.loan_because: We are business and professional women in more than 120 countries, improving the lives of women and girls in local communities and throughout the world.
teams.description: Women helping women to reclaim their dreams of a better life for themselves and their families.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Thomas More College
teams.loan_because: We challenge each other to examine the ultimate meaning of life, our place in the world, and our responsibility to others.
teams.description: At Thomas More College have committed ourselves to the integrity, concern for justice, and service to others for which our Patron and namesake - Saint Thomas More - is so justly renowned.

teams.name: Team Permaculture
teams.loan_because: We want to reinvest our surpluses in eco-social regeneration!
teams.description: Mutually supportive functionally interconnected mycelial network of permaculture actionists.

teams.name: ACACIA: A Community for Young Adults
teams.loan_because: We believe we are responsible with our own resources to care for those who have less--- this is a reflection of God's Kingdom here & now!. Kiva's concept of microfinancing is an incredible way to do that together!
teams.description: We are a diverse gathering of students, working singles, young married couples, and everything in between, 18 & up. We meet in southwest Denver as a part of West Bowles Community Church. Our desire is to realize a life that better follows Jesus’ way in the context of relationships with each other. We explore new & old ways of doing this when we get together as church @ WBCC & throughout the week.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Oak Park High School
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: A movement at Oak Park High School.

teams.name: Matoto
teams.loan_because: We believe that given the opportunity, people can transform their own lives and bring positive change to their family & community.
teams.description: We are a grassroots society based in Victoria, BC that aims to bring cultural and arts awareness to our community, to provide humanitarian aid to our friends in Giunea and around the world, and to fundraise to support others through a variety of charities and micro-credit opportunities

teams.name: tranSpec
teams.loan_because: We like to make a positive difference in the world
teams.description: A group of transit informatics professionals looking to

teams.name: Aunt Kim's Birthday Gift by Vietnam Initiative Project of Harvard-Westlake School
teams.whereabouts: Harvard-Westlake School, 3700 Coldwater Canyon Ave  Studio City, CA 91604
teams.loan_because: we want to help those in need. This project is in honor of our Aunt Kim who is battling breast cancer. She is a giving and selfless person, and we are making loans to budding entrepreneurs in extension of that spirit of generosity and charity. Please view and share our Youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lm6zI4wANSg
teams.description: Vietnam Initiative Project is a student organization started at Harvard Westlake High School with many members in high schools in Southern California. The student organization is coordinating the fundraising efforts for this project on behalf of the Aunt of one of its members.

teams.name: Kiva Hindus
teams.loan_because: the whole world is our family, and it's our duty to promote peace and prosperity in that family.
teams.description: Hindus from all over the world reaching out to help fellow human beings, regardless of religion.

teams.name: Team Japan
teams.loan_because: we feel that we can help the world, one person at a time.
teams.description:
There are many Kiva lenders who live in Japan, and we hope to be able to make a difference, not only as individuals, but now as a team. Please feel free to join us....not only from anywhere in Japan, but anywhere in the world. All you need is an interest in Japan. 

一緒に貧困をなくしましょう．．．お待ちしています！

(Picture: Mt. Fuji and the full moon at sunrise New Year's Day 2010 写真：朝日の富士山と満月２０１０年元日）

teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Heartland Oklahoma Team
teams.loan_because: Oklahomans are always willing to lend a hand to our neighbors as well as to total strangers.
teams.description: An active team of Oklahomans joining together to fund loans, work toward goals, and have fun with Kiva loan challenges.

teams.name: 101 Cookbooks
teams.loan_because: There were nearly a million visits to 101 Cookbooks last month - a statistic that continues to amaze me. As the site has grown over the years, I kept thinking to myself that it would be great to figure out a way for us to affect change as a group - Kiva (with its team lending) is a great way for us to do that.
teams.description: Readers of Heidi Swanson's online recipe journal (blog) 101cookbooks.com

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

--------------------------------

A beautiful picture of our wonderful reality… Beautiful, varied, colorful, lively.... unique……. Italian!

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Americans Overseas
teams.loan_because: Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods & services they need or want is what economic growth, independence & capitalism is all about. We wish to individually offer our support to people in their personal efforts for a better life for them and their communities.
teams.description: We are doing what we can to help make the world a better place through giving a hand to those with a plan. We are Americans residing overseas who support the efforts and the pursuit of happiness for all peoples striving for a better life.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Ireland
teams.loan_because: Small streams become mighty rivers.
teams.description: A group of Kiva Lenders from Ireland, or with links to Ireland. Feel free to join our community :)

teams.name: Unitarian Universalist Church in Cherry Hill, NJ
teams.loan_because: Microloans are an ideal way for people to help each other obtain the resources they need to build better lives.
teams.description: Committed Unitarian Universalists striving to improve the lives of others.

teams.name: Kiva Photographers
teams.loan_because: We realize that financial inclusion of the worlds poorest through microfinance can promote sustainable solutions and empowerment, and that photography is a powerful tool for telling the unheard stories of poverty.
teams.description: Extreme poverty is something that most in the developed world do not have to see very often. When it is visible, it is through the work of documentary photojournalists, videojournalists, etc...   This group is a place for amateurs and professionals alike who share a passion for photography and for social justice. As membership grows we can hopefully share some of our work that is relevant to what Kiva is doing.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Para México
teams.loan_because:
We work hard and have been fortunate enough to give a little back to our country México.
----------
Trabajamos duro  y hemos sido los suficientemente afortunados para poder ayudar un poquito a nuestro pais México.
teams.description:
This team is open for: 1) Anyone interested in supporting entrepreneurs in Mexico.  2) Any Mexican interested in supporting entrepreneurs around the world.  3) This group is just open to everyone!
----------
Este equipo esta abierto para: 1) Cualquier persona interesada en apoyar microempresarios en México. 2) Cualquier mexicano interesado en apoyar microempresarios en todo el mundo.  3) En realidad este grupo esta abierto para todos!

teams.loan_because: We have been to the field and have seen Kiva work firsthand.
teams.description: Kiva Fellows are volunteers who work for Kiva and the field partners and serve as the glue that makes Kiva's model work.

teams.name: OHIO
teams.loan_because: We are Buckeyes who Care!
teams.description:
Currently, while things may be difficult here in Ohio economically at the moment,,, we know that it may be even more difficult where you are located.

We may be only one state out of fifty  within the United States of America,,, but, we can and do make a difference! 

Why? Because we CARE, and because WE ARE BUCKEYES!!
